page.title: 12LAND OWNERSHIP
page.content: The small farming families have been unable to compete on the open market with the large financial interests of the big banks and business syndicates and have reluctantly sold out when family changes have occurred.This process has accelerated since entering the E.E.C..Other directives from this body are exampled by one farm which has switched from dairy to beef stock. Increased economic ambition amongst the larger syndicates has demanded larger units resulting in the disappearance of the hedgerows and the medieval field patterns,the traditional pattern of farmhouse surrounded by its fields;and the community which was once dependent upon the farmer.
